params.amount: Amount of tokens transferred to the promotion creator
params.promotionId: Id of the promotion being cancelled
Id of the newly created promotion

params.amount: Amount of tokens transferred to the recipient address
params.numberOfEpochs: New total number of epochs after extending the promotion
params.promotionId: Id of the promotion being extended

params.amount: Amount of tokens transferred to the recipient address
params.epochIds: Ids of the epochs being claimed
params.promotionId: Id of the promotion for which epoch rewards were claimed

_updateClaimedEpoch(uint256,uint256).details: Bits are stored in a uint256 from right to left. Let's take the example of the following 8 bits word. 0110 0011 To set the boolean value to 1 for the epoch id 2, we need to create a mask by shifting 1 to the left by 2 bits. We get: 0000 0001 << 2 = 0000 0100 We then OR the mask with the word to set the value. We get: 0110 0011 | 0000 0100 = 0110 0111

params._epochId: Id of the epoch to set the boolean for
params._epochs: Tightly packed epoch ids with their boolean values

returns._0: Tightly packed epoch ids with the newly boolean value set

params._to: Address that will receive the remaining tokens if there are any left

claimRewards(address,uint256,uint256[]).details: Rewards can be claimed on behalf of a user.Rewards can only be claimed for a past epoch.

params._epochIds: Epoch ids to claim rewards for
params._promotionId: Promotion id to claim rewards for
params._user: Address of the user to claim rewards for

createPromotion(address,address,uint216,.details: For sake of simplicity, `msg.sender` will be the creator of the promotion.We approve the contract to spend the max amount of reward tokens in order to save on gas when claiming rewards.`_latestPromotionId` starts at 0 and is incremented by 1 for each new promotion. So the first promotion will have id 1, the second 2, etc.

params._epochDuration: Duration of one epoch in seconds
params._numberOfEpochs: Number of epochs the promotion will last for
params._startTimestamp: Timestamp at which the promotion starts
params._ticket: Prize Pool ticket address for which the promotion is created
params._token: Address of the token to be distributed
params._tokensPerEpoch: Number of tokens to be distributed per epoch

returns._0: Id of the newly created promotion
true if the operation was successful

getCurrentEpochId(uint256).details: Epoch ids and their boolean values are tightly packed and stored in a uint256, so epoch id starts at 0.

params._promotionId: Promotion id to get current epoch for
Promotion id to get settings for
Promotion id to get the total amount of tokens left to be rewarded for

returns._0: Amount of tokens left to be rewarded

getRewardsAmount(address,uint256,uint256.details: Will be 0 if user has already claimed rewards for the epoch.

params._epochIds: Epoch ids to get reward amount for
params._promotionId: Promotion id from which the epoch is
params._user: Address of the user to get amount of rewards for

returns._0: Amount of tokens to be rewarded

_claimedEpochs.details: _claimedEpochs[promotionId][user] => claimedEpochsWe pack epochs claimed by a user into a uint256. So we can't store more than 255 epochs.

_latestPromotionId.details: Starts at 0 and is incremented by 1 for each new promotion. So the first promotion will have id 1, the second 2, etc.

PromotionCancelled(uint256,uint256).notice: Emmited when a promotion is cancelled.

PromotionCreated(uint256).notice: Emmited when a promotion is created.

PromotionExtended(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Emmited when a promotion is extended.

RewardsClaimed(uint256,uint256[],uint256.notice: Emmited when rewards have been claimed.

_updateClaimedEpoch(uint256,uint256).notice: Set boolean value for a specific epoch.

cancelPromotion(uint256,address).notice: Cancel currently active promotion and send promotion tokens back to the creator.

claimRewards(address,uint256,uint256[]).notice: Claim rewards for a given promotion and epoch.

extendPromotion(uint256,uint8).notice: Extend promotion by adding more epochs.

getCurrentEpochId(uint256).notice: Get the current epoch id of a promotion.

getPromotion(uint256).notice: Get settings for a specific promotion.

getRemainingRewards(uint256).notice: Get the total amount of tokens left to be rewarded.

getRewardsAmount(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Get amount of tokens to be rewarded for a given epoch.

userdoc.notice: Contract to distribute rewards to depositors in a pool.
